name: EUROPEAN FURNITURE MANUFACTURERS' FEDERATION
memberOrga: APMR, BFM, MOBDER, ACN, APIMA, BCWFI, CENFIM
goal: To maintain and promote permanent contact between the member industrial organisations and to act as the voice of the furniture manufacturing industry. To establish and represent the general interests of European furniture industry while ensuring the greatest possible influence on the rules, decisions and directives made or issued by international organisations and authorities.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: To ensure a systematic and complete awareness among its members of industrial, technical, fiscal, economic,           social  and research problems of the European furniture industry as well as about the regulations, decisions and directives relating to the industry made at European or international level. To act as a link between the furniture organisations in the European Countries in connection with the promotion of the sale of furniture in all markets.
